text:
Vinsight | Engineering Intern | SF | https://www.vinsight.co/

Vinsight is looking for a summer intern to work with our engineering team. Tasks will span data collection/pipeline improvement, application/API development and testing and machine learning exploration. Interns will also get exposure into the agriculture sector and how data science can solve many of the problems facing today's farmers.

Skills: Python, R, PostgreSQL, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, QGIS, Numpy/Scipy/Pandas/Scikit-learn

Interested in chatting email: info@vinsight.co
